options.text: I encourage people to work together as a team.
I can see the advantages and disadvantages of an approach.
I follow rules and regulations.
I easily start conversations with new people.
I listen carefully to understand what others need.
I generate several solutions to a problem.
I am comfortable making decisions when information is incomplete.
I plan work so deadlines are met with minimal last-minute changes.
I stay calm when priorities change unexpectedly.
I set ambitious targets and work hard to exceed them.
I like to verify facts before accepting a conclusion.
I make time to support colleagues when they are under pressure.
I enjoy exploring new approaches rather than repeating the usual way.
I take charge to keep a group focused and moving forward.
I feel confident presenting ideas to an audience.
I keep track of details so nothing important is missed.
I recover quickly after setbacks and refocus on what matters.
I look for opportunities to improve results and performance.
I enjoy analyzing data to identify patterns and trends.
I like to challenge assumptions and propose new possibilities.
I try to keep harmony in the team even when opinions differ.
I enjoy meeting customers or stakeholders to understand their needs.
I am motivated by achieving measurable business outcomes.
I like to keep processes consistent and repeatable.
I speak up when a decision needs to be made.
I handle pressure well when workloads increase.
I prefer to base opinions on evidence rather than assumptions.
I help ensure everyone has a chance to contribute.
I set up routines that help work run smoothly.
I enjoy competing to be among the best performers.
I think of imaginative ways to solve difficult problems.
I find it easy to build rapport with people quickly.
I stay positive and composed in uncertain situations.
I like to explore the causes behind a result before acting.
I set clear direction so others know what success looks like.
I organize tasks so the right work happens in the right order.
I enjoy negotiating for better outcomes when opportunities arise.
I can adjust my approach when things do not go to plan.
I consider how my actions will affect other people.
I enjoy explaining complex ideas in a simple way.
I check information carefully for errors or inconsistencies.
I like brainstorming options before choosing a direction.
I am willing to make tough calls when needed.
I value cooperation and work well with different personalities.
I focus on achieving results that improve business performance.
I prefer structured plans and checklists to keep work on track.
I enjoy turning abstract ideas into practical improvements.
I stay flexible when requirements change at short notice.
I like to compare options using clear criteria.
I am energized by targets, sales, and winning work.
I enjoy meeting new people and expanding my network.
I help the team stay united when there is disagreement.
I take ownership of decisions and accept accountability.
I keep standards high by following procedures consistently.
I manage stress well, even when the pace is intense.
I like persuading others and promoting ideas confidently.
I challenge results if the numbers do not add up.
I push for improvement and do not settle for average results.
I enjoy inventing new methods to achieve a goal.
I build trust by being reliable and considerate.
I am happy to take the lead when the team needs direction.
I like to structure work so each step is clear.
I enjoy speaking in meetings and sharing my views.
I like evaluating evidence before making recommendations.
I cope well when plans change and information is unclear.
I enjoy taking calculated risks to achieve bigger outcomes.
I enjoy questioning the status quo and suggesting improvements.
I focus on cooperation and resolving misunderstandings quickly.
I like to work methodically and finish tasks thoroughly.
I can influence decisions by communicating clearly and confidently.
I take control quickly when there is uncertainty about what to do.
I adapt quickly when I get new feedback or new constraints.
I like setting goals and tracking progress against them.
I enjoy checking details to ensure results are accurate.
I keep work organized so tasks are completed efficiently.
I treat people fairly and consider their perspectives.
I like thinking of new ways to make processes better.
I can handle uncertainty without getting overwhelmed.
I am prepared to make difficult decisions and move forward.
I enjoy engaging an audience and keeping attention.
I break complex issues down into smaller parts to understand them.
I prefer clear procedures and consistent standards.
I look for ways to win opportunities and grow results.
I enjoy developing original ideas to solve problems.
I stay effective even when things around me are chaotic.
I build strong relationships by being supportive.
I enjoy working with people and energizing a group discussion.
I like reviewing information carefully before committing.
I maintain structure and discipline in the way work is done.
I am motivated by achieving recognition for strong performance.
I often come up with creative alternatives when options are limited.
I make decisions quickly so the team can keep moving.
I can adjust to different ways of working without frustration.
I try to keep the team supportive and respectful.
I like investigating causes before deciding what action to take.
I like speaking up and contributing in group situations.
I push decisions through even when not everyone agrees.
I challenge ideas openly, even if it creates tension.
I stick to procedures even when they slow progress.
I prefer to figure things out myself rather than ask for help.
I sometimes take risks to achieve results faster.
I avoid conflict to keep the peace, even if issues remain unresolved.
I get impatient when discussions drift away from the goal.
I can be very direct when presenting feedback.
I change plans quickly when new information appears, even if it unsettles others.
I prefer proven methods over experimenting with new ideas.
I keep questioning decisions until the evidence convinces me.
I look for better approaches, even if it disrupts established routines.
In a crisis, I take charge quickly and expect others to follow.
I focus on hitting targets, even if it means saying no to people.
I slow down to check details, even when time is tight.
I speak up in groups even when my view is unpopular.
I adapt my style to fit the situation, even if it feels inconsistent.
I prefer clear roles and responsibilities over flexible arrangements.
I keep pushing for improvements and can be hard to satisfy.
I find it hard to let go of an idea once I believe in it.
I weigh pros and cons carefully and can delay decisions.
I follow directions without questioning to keep work moving.
I challenge authority when I believe the approach is wrong.
I focus on relationships and may avoid tough conversations.
I enjoy persuading others and can dominate the discussion.
I prefer strict schedules and feel uncomfortable with ambiguity.
I cope with change by trying different options quickly, even if some fail.
I look for chances to win and can become competitive.
I think through problems deeply, even if it slows progress.
I try new approaches and may overlook practical constraints at first.
I support colleagues, but I sometimes take on too much.
I decide quickly and can miss some details.
I stay calm under pressure, but I can appear detached.
I follow rules closely and may resist exceptions.
I enjoy speaking up, but I can talk more than I listen.
I generate many ideas and can change direction often.
